None.Name: Tainted Provoke
None.Description: Activate to taunt an enemy unit. The targeted unit will then be forced to only attack Grinder and cannot be controlled any more for 12 seconds. It will additionally be weakened and deal 75% less damage. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Harmony
None.Description: Every 15 seconds unit regenerates a certain amount of life points depending on how many friendly units are positioned within a 25m radius around it. It will restore 220 life points per every 1000 friendly life points around it, up to 2640 in total.

en.Description:
Tainted Provoke: +3s Duration
Harmony: +10 healing, up to 120 in total

Tainted Provoke: -15 Power Cost
Harmony: +20 healing, up to 240 in total

Tainted Provoke: +5s Duration
Harmony: -100 lifepoints necessary to trigger healing
